DESCRIPTION: Queue BOT account join requests. Modification of Autoapprove by https://github.com/tekulvw
NAME: BotQueue
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing BotQueue, which gives a queue for bot join requests.
`[p]help BotQueue` to see commands. No additional dependencies needed.
For support: <http://support.palmtree5.com>
